content: the finished size of the sample worked with a 4 00 mm hook is 12 cm x 5 cm 4 3/4 in x 2 in by comparison the sample worked with a 2 00 mm hook is 7 cm x 4 cm 2 3/4 in x 1 1/2 in this modest pattern is a great way to use scraps of yarn in a colorful embellishment on a baby hat or an aquatic-themed blanket this seahorse is looking to the left if you want a seahorse looking to the right check its mirror image seahorse convocation applique also a free download
